a.aria-label: Facebook page, opens in new window
Twitter feed, opens in new window
Instagram account, opens in new window

div.p: On behalf of KIPP Texas Public Schools and all the KIPPsters, we thank you for your support. You are helping to provide life-changing education, meals, and programs for our students in this time of global crisis.

What we do during a time of crisis matters, and it especially matters for the children at KIPP. One critical way to support is by making a donation to the COVID-19 & Beyond Fund. This fund will ensure that all of our KIPPsters, specifically our families who do not have reliable access to the internet, can access online learning platforms. Additionally, this fund will help cover some of the immediate needs of our KIPPsters, families, alumni, and staff who are impacted by loss of income due to COVID-19, as well as assist with the cost of food, medical supplies, childcare, unanticipated healthcare expenses, and housing. Finally, the fund will ensure our organization thrives beyond these challenging times. 100% of the funds raised will provide direct aid to KIPP families in dire need of assistance with no administrative cost.
"Gracias por todo el esfuerzo que están haciendo. Cuídense mucho por que me imagino que también tienen una familia qué proteger, algunos de ustedes. Atentamente. Fam Ramírez."
("Thanks for all the effort that you are doing. Take good care of yourselves because I imagine that some of you also have a family to take care of. Best regards, the Ramírez family. ")
"It was fun to see some of the teachers. My kids were even happier when they saw their teachers also."
To make a donation to the COVID-19 & Beyond Fund, please fill out the form below. We would be so grateful for donations of any amount.

article.class: post-5562 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail hentry

div.p: "Thank you so much for doing this. This is the only time my kids get to go out in the car for a bit (to break the monotony of being home) and they are so excited to go even if it’s just a few minutes. They love getting their bags and seeing what’s on the menu today. Sincerely what you do brings so much joy to my kiddos and is such a kind gesture. Bless you all for being there rain or shine."
